translations: n.鞑靼人（蒙古人和突厥人）；凶悍的人；难对付的人；牙石，牙垢

sentences.sentence: She can be quite a tartar.
sentences.translation: 她有时会是个专横苛刻的人。

sentences.sentence: By 3-5 years: All teeth may have tartar build-up and some tooth wear.
sentences.translation: 3 - 5岁，所有的牙齿上都有牙垢，一些牙发生磨损。

sentences.sentence: Place the egg whites and cream of tartar in a large bowl and whisk until frothy.
sentences.translation: 将蛋白和塔塔粉放在一个大碗里，打至起泡。
